name: StaffBio
tag_list: social-crm, crm, media, salesforce, sales-automation, marketing, b2b, enterprise
overview:
Specializes in providing hosted staff landing pages reflecting the social profiles of employees.

Provides the ability to instantly create web landing pages to showcase staff expertise. Landing pages are “branded” to reflect the client’s website and url. Instantly create a landing page for sales teams, customer support teams, executive management teams, or Board of Directors. All landing pages are instantly optimized for maximum organic search engine visibility.

The service is driven by a proprietary CMS with an integrated staff database. Changes are easily accommodated via a web-based administrative dashboard. Integrates with CRM services such as Salesforce and LongJump to restrict information views based on the identity of the web visitor. Provides a company the mechanism to leverage the social media profiles of its staff while reducing the need for links to FaceBook and LinkedIn. Becomes the go to site for learning about and interacting with a firm’s customer facing staff.
